check.name: SingleLineJavadoc
check.description: Checks that a Javadoc block can fit in a single line and doesn't contain block tags. Javadoc comment that contains at least one block tag should be formatted in a few lines.

property.name: violateExecutionOnNonTightHtml
property.description: Control when to print violations if the Javadoc being examined by this check violates the tight html rules defined at Tight-HTML Rules.

property.name: ignoredTags
property.description: Specify block tags which are ignored by the check.

property.name: ignoreInlineTags
property.description: Control whether inline tags must be ignored.
